Delete the wallet database for a specific fingerprint and network.

<Heading
  id={"request"}

>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the delete_database endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Delete a wallet database","required":["fingerprint","network"],"properties":{"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Wallet fingerprint","example":1234567890,"minimum":0},"network":{"type":"string","description":"Network name"}},"title":"DeleteDatabase"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
